diff_hunk:
@@ -687,6 +801,18 @@ $(PROTO_OBJS): $(PROTO_CC_SRCS) $(PBT_GEN_FILES)
 
 # Host compilation rules.
 
+# NVCC compilation rules for Tegra
+ifeq ($(BUILD_FOR_TEGRA),1)
+$(OBJDIR)%.cu.o: %.cu.cc
body: Would it be possible for you to verify this rule works with Make 3.81? I'm seeing that it's not getting matched and the build fails when it tries to use g++ to compile cu.cc files. I've tried moving it up and down in the rule list as well to see if it's an order thing, but it seems to make no difference.
